#include<stdio.h>
int main(){
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int r1,r2,t1,t2;
        scanf("%d%d%d%d",&r1,&r2,&t1,&t2);
        int arearoom,tile;
        arearoom=r1*r2;
        tile=t1*t2;
        if(arearoom%tile==0)
            printf("yes\n");
        else
            printf("no\n");
    }
}
